entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
